languages.text: "Богохульные попытки капитана Саргоны скрестить творения Механикус с ксенотехнологиями определены как имевшие эффективность. Что утяжеляет его грех".

traits.locale_text: "Богохульные попытки капитана Саргоны скрестить творения Механикус с ксенотехнологиями определены как имевшие эффективность. Что утяжеляет его грех".

languages.text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."
languages.original_text: "Богохульные попытки капитана Саргоны скрестить творения Механикус с ксенотехнологиями определены как имевшие эффективность. Что утяжеляет его грех".

traits.locale_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."
"I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."
"I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

"I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."
"I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

languages.text: 「キャプテン・サルゴナが帝国技術局の創造物と異星技術を融合させようとした冒涜的な試みは、効果的であったがゆえに、なおさら許しがたいと自分は見なしている」
languages.original_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

traits.locale_text: 「キャプテン・サルゴナが帝国技術局の創造物と異星技術を融合させようとした冒涜的な試みは、効果的であったがゆえに、なおさら許しがたいと自分は見なしている」

languages.text: "Ich identifiziere Captain Sargonas blasphemische Versuche, Schöpfungen des Adeptus Mechanicus mit Xenotech zu kombinieren, als effektiv und dadurch als umso schändlicher."
languages.original_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

traits.locale_text: "Ich identifiziere Captain Sargonas blasphemische Versuche, Schöpfungen des Adeptus Mechanicus mit Xenotech zu kombinieren, als effektiv und dadurch als umso schändlicher."

languages.text: « Je reconnais l'efficacité des efforts blasphématoire du capitaine Sargona pour combiner des créations de l'Adeptus Mechanicus avec de la xénotechnologie, ce qui les rend d'autant plus scandaleux. »
languages.original_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

traits.locale_text: « Je reconnais l'efficacité des efforts blasphématoire du capitaine Sargona pour combiner des créations de l'Adeptus Mechanicus avec de la xénotechnologie, ce qui les rend d'autant plus scandaleux. »

languages.text: «Los blasfemos intentos del capitán Sargona por combinar las creaciones del Adeptus Mechanicus con xenotecnología han de calificarse de efectivos y, por tanto, más atroces si cabe».
languages.original_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

traits.locale_text: «Los blasfemos intentos del capitán Sargona por combinar las creaciones del Adeptus Mechanicus con xenotecnología han de calificarse de efectivos y, por tanto, más atroces si cabe».

languages.text: “我在此判断，萨戈纳舰长试图将机械修会的造物与异形科技结合在一起的亵渎行为，产生了卓有成效的结果。正因如此，这样的异端恶行更加不可接受。”
languages.original_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

traits.locale_text: “我在此判断，萨戈纳舰长试图将机械修会的造物与异形科技结合在一起的亵渎行为，产生了卓有成效的结果。正因如此，这样的异端恶行更加不可接受。”

languages.text: "Kaptan Sargona'nın Adeptus Mechanicus yaratımlarını zeno teknolojisiyle birleştirmeye yönelik günahkâr girişimlerini etkili ve ziyadesiyle vahim buluyorum."
languages.original_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptan Sargona'nın Adeptus Mechanicus'un yaratımlarını zeno teknolojisiyle birleştirmeye yönelik günahkâr girişimlerini etkili ve ziyadesiyle vahim buluyorum."

languages.original_text: "I identify Captain Sargona's blasphemous attempts to combine creations of the Adeptus Mechanicus with xenotech as effective, and thus, that much more egregious."
